title: Roadmap
text: The Girls Run The World Community is built on full transparency and integrity. We believe that everyone should have the right to contribute and be an active member of our project. It’s important for us that our NFT holders know their voice matters and deserves to be heard whether it is any future proposals, decisions, ideas, collaborations, and more. This Community is built for you!

roadmapItems.title: EARLY ACCESS
roadmapItems.content: Access to premium resources, Discord chat, workshops.
roadmapItems.more: The early holders of our NFTs get exclusive access to all the premium resources in our secret Discord chat with the information that vary from educational content, NFT & crypto-themed workshops, discussions, interviews with successful entrepreneurs, and many more! We have so many different plans, projects, and collaborations in the works and those early NFT holders will be the first ones to know what’s coming up!

roadmapItems.title: GIVEAWAYS
roadmapItems.content: Airdrops of 10 NFT for our holders and more...
roadmapItems.more: As we navigate the whole new world of projects and collaboration opportunities, our goal of uplifting our community remains the same! We’ll always strive to find the best deals, discounts, and coupon codes from different companies and creators that we’ll be working with in the future. We’ll be picking those brands that partnership with them will benefit us as a whole! Additionally, we’ll be giving away 10 NFTs to the members of our community that is already holding another NFT from our collection.

roadmapItems.title: MERCH
roadmapItems.content: Personalized T-shirts, planners, and more for NFT holders.
roadmapItems.more: At this stage of our roadmap, we’ll be sending out personalized merch to our 100 NFT holders. The 100 NFT holders will be randomly chosen, however there will also be additional merch, exclusive goodie bags and a few other accessories GUARANTEED for the most loyal community members who are minting 3 of our NFTs. We’re currently in talks with several clothing brands and companies that will bring our vision to life.

roadmapItems.title: MASTERCLASS ACCESS
roadmapItems.more: Sometimes the best way to invest is to start with investing in yourself! In the earlier stages, we provide the learning resources but, as a way to say “thank you” to our wonderful community we’ll be also giving away several free one-year passes to MasterClass and other business and self-development-themed courses.

roadmapItems.title: DONATION
roadmapItems.more: We believe in the power of building on kindness and compassion and as a part of our roadmap, we are picking three wonderful foundations that contribute so much to an ever-changing world. We’ll be making donations of 5 ETH per foundation to: Malala Fund (which focuses on creating solutions that allow girls to access education) The Girls who Code Foundation (that supports girls learning and working in the STEM field - science, technology, engineering, and math) She Should Run (a non-profit organization that opens the world of possibilities for women who are interested in running for public office and therefore letting their voices be heard)

roadmapItems.title: METAVERSE LAND
roadmapItems.more: Our goal is to purchase land in Decentraland that will become an essential part of our community and our presence in the metaverse. We’ll be hosting all types of art exhibits, parties, conferences, discussions, and events. We’ll also assist our members with setting up and navigating the digital world. We’re planning a different event each month and most of them will be accessible for members only. Additionally, our NFT holders will also be a part of the DAO community and we will always be open to any initiatives regarding hosting the events/parties by those members.

roadmapItems.title: DAO
roadmapItems.content: Have a significant voice in the DAO community.
roadmapItems.more: Our DAO will allow the holders of our NFTs to vote for different ideas, plans, proposals, and other actions related to our DAO community (including future donations and contributions to different foundations and organizations). In addition, 10% of after-mint royalties will go to the DAO fund.

roadmapItems.title: 5 x 1 ETH RAFFLES
roadmapItems.content: Create a successful business plan and win 1 ETH to bring it to life!!!
roadmapItems.more: As stated in our mission, we are focusing on empowering entrepreneurs to dream big, work hard, and constantly learn and improve. We also understand that it’s not easy balancing full-time jobs, family responsibilities, and still being able to find time to research and maneuver the constantly changing world of NFTs and Web 3. This is why we would love to help as much as we can by providing a small scholarship that we hope will create change on the journey of five lucky NFT holders. At this stage, we’ll be giving away 1 ETH for one aspiring entrepreneur who comes up with the best business plan / best pitch letter possible. The business plans will be voted by the DAO community and the best one will be chosen. The 1 ETH Raffles are open to both men and women!!

roadmapItems.title: SOLD OUT!
roadmapItems.content: Girls run the World to the Moon!!!!!
roadmapItems.more: As we are celebrating and hosting a reveal party in Decentraland, we are more aware than ever that our project is not coming to an end. Instead, we are at the beginning of our road to success. This is when our 3D collection comes in. Our team will work hard to bring our collection to a whole new level full of possibilities associated with the metaverse and the digital worlds. The members of our community who hold 3 of our NFTs will be eligible to receive FREE NFT from our 3D collection as well. ”Because life is a journey and only you hold the map”
